| --- |

| FF | 0.56 |

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Values":

* V OC (open-circuit voltage)
* J SC (short-circuit current density)
* FF (fill factor)

These properties are used to evaluate the performance of solar cells and are commonly used in the field of photovoltaics.
